QuestData.Title: WANTED: Raging Earthguard
QuestData.Description:
I have been receiving formal complaints about some big earth elemental in the middle of our scouting path.
Normally I'd elect to ignore these, but the sooner we get done here, the better. Nobody wants to be stuck in this frozen hill any longer than we need to.
Payment goes to the person who brings it down!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: This earthly revenant has spawned, threatening all who approach.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill the Raging Earthguard west of Norwington Estate.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Qiz Slickcopper at the Waning Glacier.
